column1: Note:  This table is formatted so that the programmer will have an easy time creating the bibliographical entries on the front end.  This is necessary so we can properly format the bibliography.  It's a little painful, but you've already written a dissertation and it won't be anywhere near as bad as that.

column2: Unique Numerical Identifier (Use this to identify it in the Currency Table)
column3: Author(s) As they would be listed in a bibliographical entry (e.g.  Gillespie, Paula, and Neal Lerner)
column4: Title Use underscores before and after title if you want them to be underlined in the bibliography, otherwise they will be italicized.  Include punctuation.
column5: Stuff that goes after the source title, just as you would like it to appear on bibliography
